name: Flat Frat
description:
This is Flat Frat. The goal is to keep the party alive, and you best believe that YOU are responsible for it. You have the manage all the necessities of a party by supplying food, drinks, fixing the broken appliances, and making sure the cops don’t show up. You have limited time to get everything done, and the difficulty keeps getting harder as the game goes along. Good luck, its time to party hardy.

Note for browser users - Seems to be slightly laggy, and works best in full screen. To not have to deal with those issues, download the game.
